item.title: Hip Hop Chart #34!
item.dc:creator: tubm
item.description: *Machine translated… It’s charting on the iTunes hip hop charts I’m so happy ^^ It is doubtful that this song can be called hip-hop, but, well, once it’s in the charts, the details don’t matter Here’s a link to the song, if you’d like to check it out /release/samurai-switch/
item.content:encoded:
*Machine translated…

It’s charting on the iTunes hip hop charts I’m so happy ^^

It is doubtful that this song can be called hip-hop, but, well, once it’s in the charts, the details don’t matter

Here’s a link to the song, if you’d like to check it out

/release/samurai-switch/

item.title: DUBBLE UP hits #1 on iTunes’ Reggae Chart!
item.dc:creator: tubm
item.description: Was released today, and hits #1 on the chart! It’s been since 2021, TUBM took the number one spot on the reggae chart. That’s amazing! Hummingbird’s production, PAZOODOG’s lyrics, and the featured artist ã‚­ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ªãƒ³, all have great skills. Tsutchie’s mastering is also incredible, so it’s no wonder they topped the charts! Please give it a […]
item.content:encoded:
Was released today, and hits #1 on the chart!

It’s been since 2021, TUBM took the number one spot on the reggae chart. That’s amazing! Hummingbird’s production, PAZOODOG’s lyrics, and the featured artist ã‚­ãƒ ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ªãƒ³, all have great skills. Tsutchie’s mastering is also incredible, so it’s no wonder they topped the charts! Please give it a listen! It’s a serious Real Tokyo Dub Banger!

/release/dubble-up/

item.title: [NFT] – Samurai Switch
item.dc:creator: tubm
item.description: Post Updated: 8th Feb 2023 We have simplified the payout of revenue sharing. We will simply send you MATIC or JPYC to the wallet which holds NFT every month. If you already created an account at RouteNote, payout will be made by PayPal. No action needed. If you have yet to create an account at […]
item.content:encoded:
Post Updated: 8th Feb 2023

We have simplified the payout of revenue sharing. We will simply send you MATIC or JPYC to the wallet which holds NFT every month.
If you already created an account at RouteNote, payout will be made by PayPal. No action needed.
If you have yet to create an account at RouteNote, we will send MATIC or JPYC to your wallet. So no action needed.
The first payout is planned to be made between 15th ~ 20th April 2023.

Our 1st NFT minted!

Important notice: Please buy this NFT only if your country supports PayPal. Revenues can only be paid to your PayPal account.

This NFT is applied to upcoming release by Tokyo Underground Beatz Massive.

Song Title: Samurai Switch
Artist: RAGGA-G and PAZOODOG
Producer: KillA808
Release date: 30th Jan 2023

How to buy

*We have sold out all NFTs for this song. So there will be no more sales from TUBM for this song. However, there may be some who re-sell the NFTs. If you would like to know if they are available, please check this collection. You might find ones that are on sale.

Currently, you can buy at our store (JPYC), or OpenSea (MATIC).

Receipt of revenues

We have simplified the payout of revenue sharing. We will simply send you MATIC or JPYC to the wallet which holds NFT every month. If you wish to receive revenues by fiat, please refer to the “Instruction” below.

After purchase, click on “Unlockable Content” located just below. If you are on a mobile phone, you can apply to receive your revenues by using the browser that comes with crypto wallet (such as MetaMask).

Release info

New form of Hip-Hop!
Released on 30th Jan 2023!
 
RAGGA-G (ex-Def Jam Japan/Universal, currently head of B-REGGERâ€™S)
PAZOODOG (Tokyo Underground Beatz Massive)
KillA808 (Deafmuted Records, Onset Audio, Auditive)
 
You may say â€œthis isnâ€™t a hip-hopâ€, but one day youâ€™ll join us.
Music is a form of freedom, and this is what we call REAL TOKYO UNDERGROUND HIP-HOP!!!!!
(Yup, we know this is dâ€™nâ€™b beat)
 
Check this out at Emanate exclusive till 30th Jan 2023
Please come & check the release page.

About NFT

This NFT gives you right for collecting revenues from streaming and download sales from several DSPs such as Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, etc… you can check all DSPs listed in here.
 
There are 5 editions. Each of them holds 10% of right. Thus we sell up to 50%.
 
We set super cheap price for 1st and 2nd. 3rd one is moderate. 4th and 5th are our normal price.

Instruction

We have simplified the payout of revenue sharing. We will simply send you MATIC or JPYC to the wallet which holds NFT every month. If you wish to receive revenues by fiat, please follow the instruction below.

  • Create an account in PayPal, if you don’t have it yet.
  • Create an account in Routenote.
  • Assign your PayPal email address in Routenote.
  • Fill this form and submit to get revenues!
  • Any inquiry, please contact at: /contact/

Important notice

  • You can always re-sell these NFTs, but please note: as soon as you sell/transfer token, you lose right for collecting revenues.
  • All procedure can be done anonymously. Only information we collect are:
    1. Email Address (in case you enter wrong info, we will contact you)
    2. Your wallet address
    3. Routenote Username
  • We “original content creator” hold all copyrights for this music, artwork and MV, etcâ€¦ This NFT will only give you right for collecting revenues which is explained above.
  • You will receive revenues 45 days after the end of each month. Meaning, revenues which are generated in February, for example, will be distributed in around 15th of April.
  • Please note: if you wish to receive revenues by fiat, payout threshold of Routenote is 50$. Once your revenues exceed 50$, you will receive it in PayPal account which you registered to Routenote.
